item.title: Active Effect for Piercing Blow
item.author: throdo.proudfoot@gmail.com (Throdo Proudfoot)
item.description: Lots of systems, having an item (magical or not) can modify the characteristics of a Hero or an Adversary. In Foundry VTT, it is possible to have this automation using Active Effect. In this article I will show you how to automate the modification of the Piercing Blow modification using a Fell Weapon (Reward). I will tell you how to do it, how it is working and also what is the limitation (TOR2e system).
item.dc:creator: Throdo Proudfoot

item.title: Keyboard Usage
item.author: throdo.proudfoot@gmail.com (Throdo Proudfoot)
item.description: Developing a system for a TTRPG is sometimes complicated because you have to make some choice because there are as many opinions as there are people playing :) And sometimes, opinions are opposite. So I try to make the system the less opinionated to let people use it and play as they want, but there are some limits. For this first post, I will show you some keyboard keys you can use to ease your life.
item.dc:creator: Throdo Proudfoot

item.title: Very best wishes for Yule
item.author: throdo.proudfoot@gmail.com (Throdo Proudfoot)
item.description: “Very best wishes for Yule - J. R. R. Tolkien” ― Tolkien to Richard Jeffery in Letter 347, (dated 17 December 1972) How to start a blog on Tolkien’s Legacy in a better way than quoting J.R.R. Tolkien, himself ! In this period of holidays and end of year, called Yule in Middle-Earth, I decided to start a blog to share the little I know if it helps, a small gift to Tolkien’s work.
item.dc:creator: Throdo Proudfoot
